Claim #3: "Pure Storage solutions are complex and difficult to manage."

Pure's Advantage: Pure Storage solutions are designed for simplicity and ease of management. The Pure Storage platform makes it easier for customers to manage their data at any scale, because rather than layering complex systems on top of one another to provide a “unified” management experience, Pure’s data platform has it built right in from the start with Pure1 and Pure Fusion. This approach simplifies data management and reduces operational complexity.
